abstract: Brooks Sports, just one of the many holdings of the Berkshire Hathaway conglomerate, is ready to show off a special shoe, coming out just in time for the company’s annual meeting on May 5 in Omaha.
snippet: Brooks Sports, just one of the many holdings of the Berkshire Hathaway conglomerate, is ready to show off a special shoe, coming out just in time for the company’s annual meeting on May 5 in Omaha.
lead_paragraph: Air Jordans have been around for decades for fans of the basketball legend. But for disciples of Warren E. Buffett’s value investing, there has never been a shoe that captures their hero – until now.

headline.main: For Runners, a Lift From Warren Buffett
